site-description: A premium admin dashboard crafted with Material-UI and TailwindCSS for exceptional modern interfaces.
menu-dashboards-description: Elegant analytics views to visualize and control your data effortlessly.
menu-default-description: Essential components and layouts for rapid application development.
menu-visual-description: Interactive visualizations to enhance user experience and data understanding.
menu-analytics-description: Comprehensive analytics tools to track and analyze your application's performance.
menu-commerce-description: Visualized overview of sales, orders, and customer activity to guide the owner.
menu-learning-description: Detailed view of learner progress, performance, and engagement across courses.
menu-health-description: Tracks key wellness indicators and medical stats to support proactive care.
menu-finance-description: Track balances, transfer money, and view recent transactions, all in one place.
menu-booking-description: See earnings, discover destinations, and review your latest bookings.
menu-applications-description: Essential applications and tools for productivity and communication.
menu-ui-description: A collection of reusable UI components to build modern, responsive interfaces.
menu-inputs-description: Essential input components for form creation and data collection.
menu-autocomplete-description: The autocomplete is a normal text input enhanced by a panel of suggested options.
menu-button-description: Buttons allow users to take actions, and make choices, with a single tap.
menu-button-group-description: The ButtonGroup component can be used to group related buttons.
menu-checkbox-description: Checkboxes allow the user to select one or more items from a set.
menu-floating-action-button-description: A Floating Action Button (FAB) performs the primary, or most common, action on a screen.
menu-radio-group-description: The Radio Group allows the user to select one option from a set.
menu-rating-description: Ratings provide insight regarding others' opinions and experiences, and can allow the user to submit a rating of their own.
menu-select-description: Select components are used for collecting user provided information from a list of options.
menu-slider-description: Sliders allow users to make selections from a range of values.
menu-switch-description: Switches toggle the state of a single setting on or off.
menu-text-field-description: Text Fields let users enter and edit text.
menu-toggle-button-description: A Toggle Button can be used to group related options.
menu-data-display-description: Data display components are used to present data in a clear and concise manner.
menu-avatar-description: Avatars are found throughout material design with uses in everything from tables to dialog menus.
menu-badge-description: Badge generates a small badge to the top-right of its child(ren).
menu-chip-description: Chips are compact elements that represent an input, attribute, or action.
menu-divider-description: The Divider component provides a thin, unobtrusive line for grouping elements to reinforce visual hierarchy.
menu-icon-description: Guidance and suggestions for using icons with Material UI.
menu-nexture-icons-description: Nexture Icons are a collection of icons that are used to represent actions, attributes, or information.
menu-list-description: Lists are continuous, vertical indexes of text or images.
menu-table-description: Tables display sets of data. They can be fully customized.
menu-tooltip-description: Tooltips display informative text when users hover over, focus on, or tap an element.
menu-typography-description: Use typography to present your design and content as clearly and efficiently as possible.
menu-feedback-description: Feedback components are used to provide feedback to the user.
menu-alert-description: Alerts display brief messages for the user without interrupting their use of the app.
menu-backdrop-description: The Backdrop component narrows the user's focus to a particular element on the screen.
menu-dialog-description: Dialogs inform users about a task and can contain critical information, require decisions, or involve multiple tasks.
menu-progress-description: Progress indicators commonly known as spinners, express an unspecified wait time or display the length of a process.
menu-skeleton-description: Display a placeholder preview of your content before the data gets loaded to reduce load-time frustration.
menu-snackbar-description: Snackbars (also known as toasts) are used for brief notifications of processes that have been or will be performed.
menu-surfaces-description: Surfaces are used to create a paper-like surface on which to display content.
menu-accordion-description: The Accordion component lets users show and hide sections of related content on a page.
menu-card-description: Cards contain content and actions about a single subject.
menu-paper-description: The Paper component is a container for displaying content on an elevated surface.
menu-navigation-description: Navigation components are used to navigate through a site or app.
menu-bottom-navigation-description: The Bottom Navigation bar allows movement between primary destinations in an app.
menu-breadcrumbs-description: A breadcrumbs is a list of links that help visualize a page's location within a site's hierarchical structure, it allows navigation up to any of the ancestors.
menu-drawer-description: The navigation drawers (or 'sidebars') provide ergonomic access to destinations in a site or app functionality such as switching accounts.
menu-link-description: The Link component allows you to easily customize anchor elements with your theme colors and typography styles.
menu-menu-description: Menus display a list of choices on temporary surfaces.
menu-pagination-description: The Pagination component enables the user to select a specific page from a range of pages.
menu-speed-dial-description: When pressed, a floating action button can display three to six related actions in the form of a Speed Dial.
menu-stepper-description: Steppers convey progress through numbered steps. It provides a wizard-like workflow.
menu-tabs-description: Tabs make it easy to explore and switch between different views.
menu-layout-description: Layout components are used to create a layout for a page.
menu-box-description: The Box component is a generic, theme-aware container with access to CSS utilities from MUI System.
menu-container-description: The container centers your content horizontally. It's the most basic layout element.
menu-grid-description: The responsive layout grid adapts to screen size and orientation, ensuring consistency across layouts.
menu-stack-description: Stack is a container component for arranging elements vertically or horizontally.
menu-image-list-description: The Image List displays a collection of images in an organized grid.
menu-cta-copy: Go premium to get all the cool features!
landing-copy-first: Components, plugins, blocks, and layouts built with MUI, styled with Tailwind, and packaged with Vite in a beautiful harmony.
landing-copy-second: 150+ pages, both in code and design.
menu-utils-description: Functions and tools to improve MUI experience.
menu-click-away-listener-description: The Click-Away Listener component detects when a click event happens outside of its child element.
menu-modal-description: The modal component provides a solid foundation for creating dialogs, popovers, lightboxes, or whatever else.
menu-popover-description: A Popover can be used to display some content on top of another.
menu-popper-description: A Popper can be used to display some content on top of another. It's an alternative to react-popper.
menu-portal-description: The Portal component lets you render its children into a DOM node that exists outside of the Portal's own DOM hierarchy.
menu-textarea-autosize-description: The Textarea Autosize component automatically adjusts its height to match the length of the content within.
menu-transitions-description: Transitions help to make a UI expressive and easy to use.
menu-mui-x-description: MUI X is a collection of advanced React UI components for complex use cases.
menu-data-grid-description: A fast and extensible data table with filtering, sorting, aggregation, and more.
menu-data-grid-overview-description: Basic examples of the default, pro, and premium packages.
menu-data-grid-full-page-description: Full page layout for the Data Grid
menu-data-grid-inline-editing-descriptio: Edit data inside cells by double-clicking or pressing Enter.
menu-data-grid-column-grouping-descripti: Group columns in a multi-level hierarchy.
menu-data-grid-save-and-restore-state-de: Save and restore internal state and configurations like active filters and sorting.
menu-data-grid-quick-filter-description: Use a single text input to filter multiple fields.
menu-data-grid-column-visibility-descrip: Display different columns for different use cases.
menu-data-grid-column-virtualization-des: High-performance support for thousands of columns.
menu-data-grid-master-detail-description: A parent row with a collapsible child panel.
menu-data-grid-lazy-loading-description: Paginate rows and only fetch what you need.
menu-data-grid-row-reordering-descriptio: Drag and drop to reorder data.
menu-data-grid-column-pinning-descriptio: Pin columns to the left or right.
menu-data-grid-row-pinning-description: Pin rows to the top or bottom of the Grid.
menu-data-grid-row-virtualization-descri: High-performance support for large volumes of data.
menu-data-grid-tree-data-description: Support rows with a parent/child relationship.
menu-data-grid-header-filters-descriptio: Quickly accessible and customizable header filters to filter the data.
menu-data-grid-row-grouping-description: Group rows with repeating column values.
menu-data-grid-excel-export-description: Export rows in various file formats such as CSV, PDF or Excel.
menu-data-grid-aggregation-and-summary-r: Set summary footer rows or inline summaries with row grouping.
menu-data-grid-cell-selection-descriptio: Select one or more cells by dragging the mouse or using the Shift key.
menu-data-grid-clipboard-paste-descripti: Copy and paste selected cells and rows using standard keyboard shortcuts.
menu-data-grid-pivoting-description: Rearrange rows and columns to view data from multiple perspectives.
menu-data-grid-ai-assistant-description: Translate natural language into a set of grid state updates.
menu-charts-description: Visualize data with various chart types for effective data representation.
menu-tree-view-description: It allows users navigate hierarchical lists of data with nested levels.
menu-tree-view-overview-description: It allows users navigate hierarchical lists of data with nested levels.
menu-tree-view-items-description: Adds simple data to the Tree View component.
menu-tree-view-selection-description: Enables item selection for the Tree View component.
menu-tree-view-expansion-description: Handles expanding and collapsing Tree View items.
menu-tree-view-editing-description: Edits the label of Tree View items.
menu-tree-view-ordering-description: Allows dragging and dropping your items to reorder them.
menu-date-time-picker-description: A collection of React UI components for selecting dates, times, and ranges.
menu-date-time-picker-overview-descripti: A collection of React UI components for selecting dates, times, and ranges.
menu-date-time-picker-date-description: The Date Picker and Field components let the users select a date.
menu-date-time-picker-time-description: The Time Picker and Field components let the user select a time.
menu-date-time-picker-date-time-descript: The Date Time Picker and Field components let the user select a date and time.
menu-date-time-picker-date-range-descrip: The Date Range Picker and Field components let the user select a date range.
menu-date-time-picker-time-range-descrip: The Time Range Picker and Field components let the user select a time range.
menu-date-time-picker-date-time-range-de: The Date Time Range Picker and Field components let the user select a date time range.
menu-lab-description: Hosts the incubator components that are not yet ready to move to the core
menu-lab-masonry-description: Lays out contents of varying dimensions as blocks of the same width and different height.
menu-lab-timeline-description: Displays a list of events in chronological order.
menu-pages-description: Fully built layouts for various content that covers different use cases.
menu-authorization-description: Pages to control access to resources based on permissions.
menu-signin-description: Verifying users' identity to grant access to the application.
menu-signup-description: Creating a new account to get access to the application.
menu-password-reset-description: Regain access to the account by creating a new password.
menu-password-sent-description: Confirmation screen after sending the reset password email.
menu-password-new-description: New password create page that can be navigated via email.
menu-get-verification-description: Page to choose two factor authentication type.
menu-set-verification-description: Completing the two factor authentication process
menu-ecommerce-description: E-commerce pages showcase products, and enhance the online shopping experience.
menu-products-description: Shows a searchable and filterable listing page that contains products.
menu-product-detail-description: Displays product details such as images and purchasing options in editable forms.
menu-orders-description: Listing orders displays purchase details, statuses, and tracking information for customer transactions.
menu-order-detail-description: Provides comprehensive information on individual purchases, including status, items, and payment history.
menu-invoice-description: Presents billing details, payment status, and transaction records for purchases or services.
menu-user-description: Display profiles, projects, friends, permissions and personal information for individual users.
menu-overview-description: Provides a summary of profile details, settings, and activity for easy navigation.
menu-projects-description: Showcases individual or team work, progress, and management for various tasks or goals.
menu-permissions-description: Permissions define access levels, determining what users can view, edit, or manage within a system.
menu-friends-description: Users' friends display connections, interactions, and social relationships within a system.
menu-social-description: Displays posts, updates, and interactions from their connections in real time.
menu-support-description: Offers help, resources, and contact options for users needing assistance.
menu-issues-description: Shows a searchable and filterable listing page that contains issues.
menu-issue-detail-description: Tracks reported problems, statuses, and resolutions for better management and support.
menu-add-issue-description: Allows creating issues that reports problems and also can contain the solution.
menu-miscellaneous-description: Various layouts containing frequently needed content arranged in pages.
menu-faq-description: Provides a layout for answers to common questions, helping users find information quickly.
menu-knowledge-base-description: Organizes helpful articles and resources for users to find answers and information efficiently
menu-article-description: Presents written content on a specific topic, often including text, images, and related resources.
menu-search-description: Allows users to enter queries and find relevant results quickly.
menu-empty-description: Blank space ready for content or customization.
menu-error-description: Notifies users of a problem and provides guidance or options to resolve it.
menu-email-templates-description: Pre-designed layouts for efficient and consistent communication.
menu-plugins-description: Various extensions, offering different features with lots of customization.
menu-plugins-lightbox-description: Enhances media display by overlaying images or videos in a focused, interactive view.
menu-plugins-carousel-description: Smooth scrolling through multiple images or content slides in an interactive display.
menu-plugins-video-player-description: Enables users to play, pause, and control media playback for video and audio content.
menu-plugins-text-editor-description: Provides features for writing, formatting, and editing text efficiently.
menu-plugins-dropzone-description: It enables drag-and-drop file uploads with a user-friendly interface.
menu-plugins-validation-description: Checks and ensures input data meets required rules for accuracy and security.
